official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, relating to drug testing of individuals applying for drivers' licenses.

summary.text: Mandates that certain Federal-aid highway apportionments be withheld from a State unless it requires first-time driver's license applicants to submit to a urinalysis for detection of controlled substances. Sets forth a formula for the withholding of apportionments.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, relating to drug testing of individuals applying for drivers' licenses.
